Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities start performing an event
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain; ► place where Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) was to sacrifice his son and where Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) built the temple
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear
Node.definition: = process by which humans, deities, or objects become perceptible, primarily though not necessarily exclusively to the eye
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to prepare|to make ready|to make provisions (for something)
Node.definition: = causative action where humans or deities make objects ready for use
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= level, circular area about 7.5 to 12 meters in diameter, where people threshed their grain; usually located near the fields where the grain was grown, and if possible, in an elevated area that was exposed to the breeze
= man, also known as Arauna (אֲרַוְנָה) ◄ from Jebus (יְבוּסִי) ► sold his threshing floor to David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Jebus (יְבוּס) ◄ original inhabitants of Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= action by which humans or deities start performing an event
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
literally: to lay as foundation; hence: = action by which humans or deities make a firm decision about something
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm
= the overall dimensions or capacity of an object
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm

= room of relatively small size ► functioning as entrance room to a larger room
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= causative action by which someone covers an object with a layer of (precious) metal, wood, glaze, or with precious stones
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= state in which objects consist of pure ingredients from which all contaminants have been carefully removed; ≈ regarded as attractive and desirable

= causative action by which humans cover an object with a thin layer of a substance, such as cloth, metal, or wood
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction

exact meaning unsure: = one of the evergreen trees commonly found in the Lebanon, with round leaves rather than flat; its fruit is a a mostly inedible seed bearing, fleshy cone; ≈ regarded as one of the glorious trees of the Lebanon
= causative action by which humans cover an object with a thin layer of a substance, such as cloth, metal, or wood

= a series of metal links or rings fitted into one another and used to joining different objects together; also used for decoration purposes
